div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1589 Damour, c. 20 km. S of Beirut, Phoe- nicia, 1949 Burial: c. 170 B.C. (M) Contents: 4 AR Ptolemy IV or V: 3 tetradr. (Tyre 1 as Svoronos 1177 var.; Sidon 1 as Sv. 1186 var.; Ascalon 1 as Sv. 1188) Ptolemy VI: 1 tetradr. (Alexandreia as Sv. 1231) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Syria 1951, p. 212, note 1; Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
